snippet: Top-seeded Stan Wawrinka will play Marin Cilic for the Geneva Open title after both advanced from the semifinals on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Stan Wawrinka will play Marin Cilic for the Geneva Open title after both advanced from the semifinals on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Stan Wawrinka, Marin Cilic Advance to Geneva Open Final
headline.main: Stan Wawrinka, Marin Cilic Advance to Geneva Open Final
